basics.name: Aarjith Nandakumar
basics.label: Frontend Engineer and UI designer
basics.summary: Aspiring to be at the forefront of the latest and greatest of front end technologies while working in innovative digital products where I can apply my creative skills and provide innovative solutions.

work.summary: Frontend engineer for a digital insurance platform.
highlights: Designed and developed inhouse javascript components for integration of the REST APIs and Web CMS frontend.
Involved in accessibility review and enhancement for the application.
Designed and developed a Cordova hybrid mobile application for the digital platform using REST APIs that powers the web application.
Worked extensively in Adobe Experience Manager.
Developed a javascript unit testing framework using Jasmine.
Introduced a test driven development approach for javascript components.
Created and maintained automation test cases for Selenium scripts.
Worked in an Agile environment and participated, conducted Scrum.

work.summary: Moved to research and development in the domain of social media applications.
highlights: Involved in UX design and accesibility review of an enterprise social network.
Developed frontend for a digital social CRM platform.
Designed and developed an Intranet portal on Sharepoint for a customer.

work.summary: Worked as an interface developer for a global banking client.
highlights: Translated business requirements to effective design documents.
Involved in design, coding, unit testing and support lifecycles.
Collaborated with multiple teams in diverse locations.
Responsible for technical documentation and project tracking.
Designed and developed a team collaboration site in Sharepoint.

awards.title: Engage Award
awards.summary: For the commitment and dedication shown in delivering the project ontime.

awards.title: BPS Champions League - Team
awards.summary: Excellent performance from the team. Well beyond commitment and excellence on the deliveries.

awards.title: On the Spot Award
awards.summary: Was key member in Jan 2014 release implementation. The quality of work was very well received and appreciated by clients.

awards.title: Galaxy of Thanks
awards.summary: Awarded for the work in enhancing Prestige card portfolio.

awards.title: Certificate Of Appreciation
awards.summary: Selected as National team award for successful completion of SAS projects.

publications.name: Frontend workflow for Maven projects
publications.summary: A worklow to handle frontend tasks in a maven project

references.name: Ken Dunn
references.reference: Aarjith Nandakumar did a great job creating documenta- tion for COR project., the VISIO flow charts were accurate and very easy to understand and follow. His actions to ensure quality deliverables illustrates our drive for results.
